SENT.plain: The structure of the locus encoding the major cartilage collagen gene (COL2A1) was studied in a total of 19 cases of achondroplasia
The segregation of COL2A1 was examined in three affected kindreds using restriction site and length variants as genetic markers
In two kindreds discordant segregation between the achondroplasia and COL2A1 loci was demonstrated
Paternity/maternity was confirmed using a 'minisatellite' core sequence probe which reveals cross hybridising polymorphic loci
